sessionId.title: Session ID
sessionId.description: Session ID associated with experience event, used to stitch together independent events which occurred in the same session.

feedId.title: Feed ID
feedId.description: Composite ID of the publisher, ad exchange, and other features.

sspPartnerCode.title: SSP Partner Code
sspPartnerCode.description: The partner (exchange) through which Adobe Advertising Cloud receives the inventory opportunity.

siteId.title: Site ID
siteId.description: Identifier for the web site where ad impression was served.

costCurrency.title: Cost Currency
costCurrency.description: The ISO 4217 currency code used to pay partner for in ad opportunity.

inventorySourceId.title: Inventory Source ID
inventorySourceId.description: The ID of the Adobe Advertising Cloud inventory source this opportunity was delivered on.

segment.title: Segmentation Details
segment.description: Details associated with user segmentation rules.
